modelCorrections.rawOutput:
- Thought: To make the HTML accessible according to WCAG 2.1 guidelines, I need to add the "lang" attribute to the `<html>` tag to specify the primary language of the document. This helps screen readers and other assistive technologies provide the correct language context to users.

- Corrected HTML: `<html lang="en" prefix="og: http://ogp.me/ns#" class="td-md-is-chrome">`
